name: Clive over BF Skin
description:
Since according to Gamebanana, this is 'shit' I thought I'd put it on itch.io. Anyway it's as the title states. I redrew (rather traced) my OC and put him over the Boyfriend. Use the skin however you like I guess.

Special thanks to bad coffee time guy for the Clive Icons

PhantomArcade is the original sprite artist for Friday Night Funkin and I traced over Boyfriend
